column6: Let us gaze into the universal divinity and commune with the mother, in our agreement.

column5: ARC is a full-service corporation. We've got what plants crave.

column6: We are all entrusted by the wisdom of the mothers; universally, unequivocably and yet, unevenly. What is the false interpretation?
The Third Mother will guide us to wisdom in our agreement. Let us begin.

column5: I'm so glad you've chosen to follow our way of life. This planet will be a new peace amongst all people.
We see you, we are here. We commune.

column6: The Lord of the Cosmos moves through us. We worship him in our communion.
